data.title: D. E. Shaw Research: Resources
data.meta_description: D. E. Shaw Research makes a variety of resources and scientific publications available without cost for members of the research community.
data.text:
Resources

Downloads

Desmond: An MD simulation software package that runs on certain commodity GPUs. We make Desmond available at no cost for use by faculty members, researchers, and/or students at academic and not-for-profit institutions.

Molecular Dynamics Simulations Related to SARS‑CoV‑2: Trajectory data obtained by our scientists from long simulations on our Anton supercomputers. We make this data available without cost and for any purpose.

Simulation Time on Anton

We make an Anton supercomputer available without cost for non-commercial research use by U.S. universities and other not-for-profit institutions. Proposals for simulation time on Anton are evaluated by a committee convened by the National Academies of Science, Engineering, and Medicine.
